column1: Camellia Sackville was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Camellia was daughter of the head of the Sackville Family. She married Longo Baggins
column3: Otho Sackville-Baggins. The double surname Sackville-Baggins was bestowed on her son
column4: after the death of Camellias father
column5: as he was the eldest grandson

column1: wikipedia:Camellia is a group of Asian plants.
In early sketches of the Family Trees
column2: Camellia was said to be from Michel Delving.
